content: welcome to the let s strip 2024 cal by kimberlie goodnough aka shopkimberlie this free pattern crochet-a-long was released in 8 manageable parts throughout june july and august 2024 in the facebook group linked below while we are finished working as a group these patterns will remain free forever here on ravelry and as files within the group let s strip is a journey through some of the most beautiful and tactile stitches in crochet though none of them are difficult or complicated to learn every new pattern is a strip that will be joined to create an adult-sized throw which you can jaygo or set aside until the end i hope you enjoy stitching this beauty and that you enjoy all of my patterns <3 https //www facebook com/groups/940051480700972 #letsstripcal2024 #shopkimberliecal
